CAN_NOT_START.TITLE: Start not possible
CAN_NOT_START.INFO: A manual program is running right now.

SMART_SPRINKLER.TITLE: Smart sprinkler
SMART_SPRINKLER.INFO: Smart sprinkler uses weather data to control the sprinkler runtimes automatically.

RAIN_VALUE.TITLE: Thresholded rain
RAIN_VALUE.INFO: Amount of rain, where watering should be disabled.

WIND.TITLE: Wind
WIND.INFO: Disable watering for wind speed above

WIND_VALUE.TITLE: Thresholded wind speed
WIND_VALUE.INFO: Wind speed, where watering should be disabled.

MAX_TEMP.TITLE: Threshold Max temperature
MAX_TEMP.INFO: Watering will be longer for temperatures above:

MAX_TEMP_VALUE.TITLE: Extend watering by:
MAX_TEMP_VALUE.INFO: Extend watering by the given value.

MIN_TEMP.TITLE: Threshold Min temperature
MIN_TEMP.INFO: Watering will be shortened for temperatures below:

MIN_TEMP_VALUE.TITLE: Shorten watering by:
MIN_TEMP_VALUE.INFO: Shorten watering by the given value.

MAIL.TITLE: Winter warning
MAIL.INFO: Send e-mail notification for temperatures below:

WINTER.TITLE: Winter mode
WINTER.INFO: The winter mode disables all sprinkler runtimes. If this setting is enabled, no configurations can be made.

WEATHER.WIND_TODAY_OFF: The watering for today is disabled, due to high wind speeds.
WEATHER.RAIN_TODAY_OFF: The watering for today is disabled, due to high precipitation.

CAN_NOT_START.INFO: Single sprinkler cycles can not be started

WRONG_FORMAT.TITLE: The given e-mail address is in a wrong format.
WRONG_FORMAT.INFO: Please insert a valid e-mail address.

WRONG_SORTING.TITLE: Error in interval order
WRONG_SORTING.INFO: The start of interval 2 must be behind interval 1.

AUTO_DEVICES.INFO: Automatically generate devices from FHEM to dedicated rooms.

PICKER.TITLE: Thanks! Thanks! Thanks!
PICKER.INFO: Without this, FhemNative wouldn´t be possible.
PICKER.ANGULAR: For the giant amount of ressources and a wonderful framework.
PICKER.IONIC: For the native support and a cool community.
PICKER.ELECTRON: For the native desktop app support.
PICKER.FHEM: For the best home automation software
PICKER.ntruchsess: For a reliable and well structured websocket.
